While my success might make me appear arrogant to some, it is merely the confidence of a man who has clawed his way up and sees a clear path to greater wealth and influence. My current capital of over 230,000 ducats is significant, but the next step requires careful calculation: do I further invest in more rental properties, which have proven profitable, or seek a larger, more ambitious venture that truly befits an empire builder, such as expanding my warehousing capacity or acquiring prime land for a significant commercial enterprise?
